hero.title: The Linear for databases
hero.subtitle: Stop wrestling with clunky SQL clients. QoreDB is a unified, local-first database engine designed for speed, security, and developer joy.

local.title: Local-First
local.desc: Your data never leaves your machine. Airtight security by design.

unified.title: Unified Engine
unified.desc: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB. One interface to rule them all.

ai.title: AI Context
ai.desc: Intelligent query assistance that understands your schema, not just SQL.
